info.title: NetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

get.description: Gets all of the available subnet delegations for this subscription in this region.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Request successful. Returns all of the possible delegations for a subnet in this subscription in the region.

get.description: Gets all of the available subnet delegations for this resource group in this region.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the domain name.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Request successful. Returns all of the possible delegations for a subnet in this subscription in the region.

actions.description: Describes the actions permitted to the service upon delegation.

id.description: A unique identifier of the AvailableDelegation resource.

name.description: The name of the AvailableDelegation resource.

serviceName.description: The name of the service and resource.

AvailableDelegation.description: The serviceName of an AvailableDelegation indicates a possible delegation for a subnet.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.
